In addition to [NPS's Academic Policy Manual](https://my.nps.edu/web/registrar/academic-policy-manual), DA 3440 adopts the following policies.

# Auditing Students

For more information, see the [NPS Auditing Policy](https://nps.smartcatalogiq.com/en/Current/Academic-Catalog/General-Academic-Information/Auditing).

# Grading

For more information see the [NPS Grading Policy](https://nps.smartcatalogiq.com/en/Current/Academic-Catalog/General-Academic-Information/Grading).

# Late and Missing Assignments

* All assignments are due before class begins one week after they are handed out unless you have been granted an extension due to unforeseen circumstances.
* A late submission is defined as any work, including quizzes, submitted after the deadline. 
    + For a late submission, the student will receive a 50% scaling of their grade for the each occurrence.


# Plagiarism

For more information see the [NPS Honor Code](https://nps.smartcatalogiq.com/en/Current/Academic-Catalog/General-Academic-Information/Honor-Code).
